front.title: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Event Package for OMA Content Push Delivery

abstract.t: This document specifies a new event package for OMA Push-basedservice over SIP. The purpose is to allow an OMA application or a UAto subscribe to updates to its own OMA application events containingeither content or references to the content.This document further describes how content can be pushed out to anapplication by the use of OMA Push-based events.
